alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:29PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Camden and central Glynn Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 529 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dock Junction, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Dock Junction, Country Club Estates, Jekyll Island and Dover Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn
